_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the time-series event.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The time when an event or observation occurred.

eventType.title: Event Type
eventType.description: The primary event type for this time-series record.

eventMergeId.title: ExperienceEvent merge ID
eventMergeId.description: An ID to correlate or merge multiple Experience events together that are essentially the same event or should be merged. This is intended to be populated by the data producer prior to ingestion.

producedBy.title: Produced By
producedBy.description: Value that describes the producer of the event - suggested values would be 'self', 'system', 'salesRep', etc. Can be used to filter out certain producers if needed.

alerts.description: Alert information including alert impressions and clickthroughs as well as alert setups.

clicks.title: Alert Clicks
clicks.description: Counts the number of times an alert has been clicked.

dismissals.title: Alert Dismissals
dismissals.description: Counts the number of times an alert has been dismissed.

impressions.title: Alert Impression Details
impressions.description: An array of alerts that have been displayed to a customer.

userAccount.description: Loyalty details, preferences, login processes, and other account preferences.

accountSwitch.title: Switch User Accounts
accountSwitch.description: Captures when a visitor switches their account during a visit.

cookieConsentAccepted.title: Cookie Consent Accepted
cookieConsentAccepted.description: Tracked when a visitor opts-in to allowing cookies to be set within their browser.

cookieConsentViewed.title: Cookie Consent Viewed
cookieConsentViewed.description: Tracked when a visitor views the cookie consent information.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot password process.

forgotUsername.title: Forgot Username
forgotUsername.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot username process.

login.title: Visitor Login
login.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor login.

loginBiometric.title: Biometric Authentication
loginBiometric.description: Flag determining if the user has used a biometric authentication process to login.

loginFailure.title: Visitor Login Failure
loginFailure.description: Counter event indicating a failed visitor login attempt.

loginLocation.title: Login Page Location
loginLocation.description: When multiple login locations exist on the page, this value should be used to identify the specific location the user used for login

loginKeychain.title: Keychain
loginKeychain.description: Flag determining if the user has used a keychain authentication process to login.

loginMultiFactor.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
loginMultiFactor.description: Flag determining if the user has used a multi-factor authentication process to login.

loginStatus.title: Login Status
loginStatus.description: Used to track the current login status for site visitors, regardless of whether login occurred as a result of a login during the current session or a previous session as identified by a cookie value.

loginThirdParty.title: Login with Third Party
loginThirdParty.description: Counter event that is incremented when a visitor has used another login network to authenticate, such as Apple, Facebook, or Google.

loginThirdPartySite.title: Third Party Login Site
loginThirdPartySite.description: Tracks the site used to authetnicate when a third-party sign-in event is tracked.

logout.title: Visitor Logout
logout.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor logout.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the reset password process.

sessionTimeout.title: Session Timeout
sessionTimeout.description: Tracked when a visitor has an authenticated session that is automatically logged out after a predetermined amount of time.

updateProfile.title: Account Profile Update
updateProfile.description: Counter event indicating a user has updated their account profile.

autoPayEnrollmentStatus.title: Autopay Status
autoPayEnrollmentStatus.description: Tracks the visitor's autopay enrollment status.

personalFinances.description: Financial details including transactions, accounts, and applications.

cardID.title: Card ID
cardID.description: Tracks the identifier for the card being activated.  This might be different from the card number.

cardActivated.title: Card Activated Success
cardActivated.description: Tracks when a card has been successfully activated.

cardActivationStart.title: Card Activation Started
cardActivationStart.description: Tracks when a card activation process has been started.

cardCancelled.title: Card Cancelled
cardCancelled.description: Tracks when a card has been cancelled.

cardControlsLocked.title: Card Controls Locked
cardControlsLocked.description: Tracks when a card controls have been locked.

cardControlsUnlocked.title: Card Controls Unlocked
cardControlsUnlocked.description: Tracks when a card controls have been unlocked.

cardLocked.title: Card Locked
cardLocked.description: Tracks when a card has been locked.

cardOrderNew.title: Order New Card
cardOrderNew.description: Tracks when a card has been requested.

cardOrderType.title: Card Order Type
cardOrderType.description: Tracks the type of card order associated with a card order event.

cardType.title: Card Type
cardType.description: Tracks the type of card associated with an event.

cardUnlocked.title: Card Unlocked
cardUnlocked.description: Tracks when a card has been unlocked.

balanceTransfers.description: Captures the details of balance transfers between accounts.

accountTo.title: Account To
accountTo.description: Extension of financialAccount data type.  Details the account to which the balance is being transferred.

accountFrom.title: Account From
accountFrom.description: Extension of financialAccount data type.  Details the account fr which the balance is being transferred.

financialAccount.title: Financial Account
financialAccount.description: Extension of financialAccount data type.  Details the account to which the balance is being transferred.

scheduledTransactionDate.title: Scheduled Transaction Date
scheduledTransactionDate.description: Records the scheduled date/time of the transaction.

serviceProvider.description: Tracks all details related to a biller.

name.title: Service Provider Name
name.description: The name/nickname for the service provider.

userAccountID.title: User Account ID
userAccountID.description: The user account ID for the service provider.

cardApplicationSteps.title: Card Application Steps
cardApplicationSteps.description: Extension of form application data type.

creditLimitIncrease.title: Credit Limit Increase
creditLimitIncrease.description: Extension of form application data type.

account.title: Deposit Account
account.description: Extension of financialAccount data type. Details of the account and transactions associated with the deposit.

mobileDeposit.title: Mobile Deposit
mobileDeposit.description: Indicator for whether the deposit was done through mobile or not.

loan.title: Loan
loan.description: Extension of form application data type.

xdm:annualPercentageRate.title: Annual Percentage Rate
xdm:annualPercentageRate.description: Records the annual percentage rate of the loan.

xdm:downpayment.title: Downpayment
xdm:downpayment.description: Captures the downpayment amount of loan.

xdm:startDate.title: Start Date
xdm:startDate.description: Records the anticipated start date of the loan.

xdm:endDate.title: End Date
xdm:endDate.description: Records the anticipated end date of the loan.

xdm:interestRate.title: Interest Rate
xdm:interestRate.description: Records the interest rate of the loan.

xdm:interestType.title: Interest Type
xdm:interestType.description: Records the type interest rate of the loan, i.e. fixed or variable.

xdm:term.title: Term
xdm:term.description: Records the duration of the loan, in months.

web.title: Web
web.description: Link clicks, web page details, referrer information, and browser details.

linkID.title: Link ID
linkID.description: Optional user-entered value as the `id`  of the link element in the HTML of the email.

webPageID.title: Web Page ID
webPageID.description: Unique ID of the web page.

name.title: Name
name.description: The normative name of the web page. This name is not necessarily the page title or directly associate with page content, but is used to organize a site's pages for classification purposes.

queryParameters.title: Query Parameters
queryParameters.description: Query Parameters used for the web page. This is normally the value of a string after `?` in the url.

URL.title: URL
URL.description: The normative or usual URL of the web page.  This may or may not be the actual URL used to reach the page, which would be recorded using `Web Link`.

isPersonalizedURL.title: Is Personalized URL
isPersonalizedURL.description: Boolean indicating if person accessed the web page via a personalized URL.

URL.title: URL
URL.description: URL of referrer to web page.

listID.title: List ID
listID.description: Unique ID of the Marketing List.

isPrimary.title: Is Primary
isPrimary.description: Boolean indicating if person is the primary contact on the Opportunity.

role.title: Role
role.description: Role of the person on the Opportunity.

dataValueChanges.title: Data Value Changes
dataValueChanges.description: Full record of data values updated

assignTo.title: Assign To
assignTo.description: Sales user converted lead is assigned to.

isSentNotificationEmail.title: Is Sent Notification Email
isSentNotificationEmail.description: Indicates whether assigned sales user received email notification of the converted lead.

source.title: Source
source.description: Source of the action that triggered the interesting moment.

scoreAttributeID.title: Score Atribute ID
scoreAttributeID.description: Unique ID of the lead score attribute.

scoreAttributeName.title: Score Atribute Name
scoreAttributeName.description: Friendly name of the lead score attribute.

changeValue.title: Change Value
changeValue.description: Absolute value or difference between new value and previous value of the lead score attribute.

newValue.title: New Value
newValue.description: New value of the lead score attribute.

oldValue.title: Old Value
oldValue.description: Previous value of the lead score attribute.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Reason for the change to the lead score attribute.

urgency.title: Urgency
urgency.description: Gauge of how much the lead's score has changed recently.

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: Overall priority the lead should receive based on urgency and score.

relativeScore.title: Relative Score
relativeScore.description: How the lead's score compares to other leads in the database.

relativeUrgency.title: Relative Urgency
relativeUrgency.description: How the lead's urgency compares to other leads in the database.

newStatusID.title: New Status ID
newStatusID.description: ID of the lead's new status in the campaign.

newStatusName.title: New Status Name
newStatusName.description: Friendly name of the lead's new status in the campaign.

oldStatusID.title: Old Status ID
oldStatusID.description: ID of the lead's previous status in the campaign.

oldStatusName.title: Old Status Name
oldStatusName.description: Friendly name of the lead's previous status in the campaign.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Reason for the change in the lead's status.

isAcquiredBy.title: Is Acquired By
isAcquiredBy.description: Boolean indicating if lead was acquired by the campaign.

isSuccessful.title: Is Successful
isSuccessful.description: Boolean indicating if there was a change in the lead's status.

directMarketing.title: Direct marketing
directMarketing.description: Events and properties related to direct and outbound marketing such as email, direct mail, texts, and in-app notifications.

mailingID.title: Mailing ID
mailingID.description: Unique ID of the email asset.

mailingName.title: Mailing Name
mailingName.description: Friendly name of the email asset.

emailBouncedCode.title: Email Bounced Category
emailBouncedCode.description: Code denoting the type of bounce received from the Mail Transfer Agent.

emailBouncedDetails.title: Email Bounced Details
emailBouncedDetails.description: Details of email bounce from the Mail Transfer Agent.

testVariantID.title: Test Variant ID
testVariantID.description: Unique ID of the test variant of the email asset.

testVariantName.title: Test Variant Name
testVariantName.description: Friendly name of the test variant of the email asset.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: The information related to web page and link of the ExperienceEvent.

operatingSystem.title: Operating system
operatingSystem.description: The name of the operating system used when the observation was made. The attribute should not contain any version information such as '10.5.3', but instead contain 'edition' designations such as 'Ultimate' or 'Professional'.

browserDetails.title: Browser details
browserDetails.description: The browser specific details such as browser name, version, javascript version, user agent string, and accept language.

userAgent.title: User agent
userAgent.description: The HTTP user-agent string from the client request.

ipV4.title: IPv4
ipV4.description: The numerical label assigned to a device participating in a computer network that uses the Internet Protocol for communication.

device.title: Device
device.description: An identified device, application or device browser instance that is trackable across sessions, normally by cookies.

isMobileDevice.title: Is Mobile Device
isMobileDevice.description: Boolean that indicates if device used was a mobile device.

model.title: Model
model.description: The name of the model for the device. This is the common, human-readable, or marketing name for the device. For example, the 'iPhone 6S' is a particular model of mobile phone.

search.title: Search
search.description: The information related to web or mobile search.

searchEngine.title: Search engine
searchEngine.description: The search engine used by the search.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.description: Information related to advertising impressions, clickthroughs, and attribution.

application.title: Application
application.description: This mixin is used to capture application information related to an ExperienceEvent, including the name of the application, app version, installs, launches, crashes, and closures. It could be either the application targeted by the event like the send of a push notification or the application originating the event such as a click, or a login.

channel.title: Experience channel
channel.description: Experience channel related to the ExperienceEvent.

productListItems.title: Product list items
productListItems.description: A list of items representing a product selected by a customer with specific options and pricing that are for that usage context at a specific point of time and may differ from the product record.

commerce.title: Commerce
commerce.description: Product returns, warranty registration, and shopping cart/order process.

placeContext.title: Place context
placeContext.description: The transient circumstances related to the observation. Examples include locale specific information such as weather, local time, traffic, day of the week, workday vs. holiday, and working hours.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: Tracks offer impression and social network interactions.

media.title: Media
media.description: Media activity information related to the experience event.

dataSource.title: Data source
dataSource.description: Globally unique identification of a data source.

receivedTimestamp.title: Received time stamp
receivedTimestamp.description: The time at which this interaction was received by a server.

fileTransfer.description: Information for file download or file upload activities.

fileDownload.title: File Download
fileDownload.description: Tracks all details of a file download. Extension of file transfer data type.

fileUpload.title: File Upload
fileUpload.description: Tracks all details of a file upload. Extension of file transfer data type.

implementationDetails.title: Implementation details
implementationDetails.description: Accomodates tracking versioning details for the Adobe Experience Cloud solutions deployed.

siteKnowledge.description: Knowledge base tracking, support site searches and forum interaction details.

knowledgeBaseArticleID.title: Knowledge Base Article ID
knowledgeBaseArticleID.description: Tracks the knowledge base article ID when it has been viewed.

knowledgeBaseArticleType.title: Knowledge Base Article Type
knowledgeBaseArticleType.description: Tracks the knowledge base article type when it has been viewed.

knowledgeBaseArticleView.title: Knowledge Base Article View
knowledgeBaseArticleView.description: Tracked when a knowledge base article has been viewed.

offers.description: Offer tracking, including offer impressions and clickthroughs.

clicks.title: Offer Clicks
clicks.description: Counts the number of times an offer has been clicked.

dismissals.title: Offer Dismissals
dismissals.description: Counts the number of times an offer has been dismissed.

impressions.title: Offer Impression Details
impressions.description: An array of advertisements that have been displayed to a customer.

profileStitch.title: Profile stitch
profileStitch.description: Details about the IDs that were joined by profile stitching.

pushNotificationTracking.title: push notification tracking details
pushNotificationTracking.description: Describes interaction with a push notification.

customAction.title: custom action
customAction.description: End user clicked custom action in the push notification

value.title: value
value.description: value associated with the custom action, if any

pushProviderMessageID.title: Push Provider message ID
pushProviderMessageID.description: ID assigned to this notification as assigned by the push provider

pushProvider.title: Push Provider
pushProvider.description: Push provider, e.g. apns or fcm

quotes.description: Quotes information including discount, premium, and request ID.

requestID.title: Quote Request ID
requestID.description: Unique identifier for the quote request.

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Records the discount amount for a quote displayed to a visitor.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: Records the premium amount for a quote displayed to a visitor.

location.title: Location
location.description: Captures the postal code used for finding retailers near the visitor's location.

selectedRetailer.title: Selected Retailer
selectedRetailer.description: Captures the selected retailer for a quote request, if applicable.

servicePaymentDetails.description: Payments that are not be considered part of a typical commerce transaction, such as when a customer pays a bill or initiates a recurring payment.

socialMarketing.description: Tracks interactions related to social marketing sites, such as shares and follows.

sharedContent.title: Shared Content
sharedContent.description: Tracks the page/url/content/value of the item being shared.

follow.title: Follow
follow.description: Tracks when a social follow event has occurred.

interactions.title: Interactions
interactions.description: The total number of social interactions.

network.title: Network
network.description: Tracks the social sharing network in use, i.e. Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

target.title: Target
target.description: For social interactions, this is the URL (or resource) which receives the social network action.

share.title: Share
share.description: Tracks when a social sharing event has occurred.

surveyResponse.description: Stores details related to a survey that has been completed by a user.

surveyAnswers.title: Survey Answers
surveyAnswers.description: An array of the answers provided by the visitor within a survey.

surveyID.title: Survey ID
surveyID.description: ID for the specific survey taken.

surveyQuestions.title: Survey Questions
surveyQuestions.description: An array of the questions presented to the visitor within a survey.

claims.description: Captures fields related to a claim when initated by a customer.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Date the claim was successfully submitted.

status.title: Status
status.description: Captures the status of the claim for any given point in the application process.

customerFeedback.description: Customer interaction information such as chat, click to call, email and survey questions/answers.

chatDeclined.title: Chat Declined
chatDeclined.description: Captured when an offered chat is declined by a visitor.

chatEnd.title: Chat End
chatEnd.description: Captured when a chat is ended with a visitor.

chatOffered.title: Chat Offered
chatOffered.description: Captures the number of times a chat session has been offered to a visitor.

chatSessionID.title: Chat Session ID
chatSessionID.description: Captures the chat session identifier, if available.

chatStart.title: Chat Start
chatStart.description: Captured when a chat is initiated with a visitor.

clickToCall.title: Click to Call
clickToCall.description: Visitor initiates a call to the client from a telephone number link on the site/app.

clickToDirectMessage.title: Click to Direct Message
clickToDirectMessage.description: Visitor initiates a direct message or feedback to the client from a direct message form on the site/app.

clickToEmail.title: Click to Email
clickToEmail.description: Visitor initiates an email to the client from an email link on the site/app.

clickToText.title: Click to Text
clickToText.description: Visitor initiates a SMS/text message to the client from a SMS/text link on the site/app.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Subject of contact requested by the visitor, such as in-store purchase support, online order support, credit customer service, etc.

callBackNumber.title: Call Back Contact Information
callBackNumber.description: The contact phone number the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.

replyToEmailAddress.title: Reply to Email Address
replyToEmailAddress.description: The email address the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.

deviceTradeInDetails.description: Device activation, configuration, and trade-in details.

originalDeviceID.title: Original Device ID
originalDeviceID.description: ID for the device being traded.

newDeviceID.title: New Device ID
newDeviceID.description: ID for the new device being traded for.

tradeInValue.title: Trade In Value
tradeInValue.description: Value of the device being traded.

reservations.description: Interaction tracking for flights, lodging, vehicles, and dining reservations.

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.description: Tracked when a reservation has been cancelled.

created.title: Created
created.description: Tracked when a reservation has been created.

currencyCode.title: Currency Code
currencyCode.description: Currency code used to make the purchase. ISO 4217 currency code.

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: The end drop-off/return/check-out date of the reservation.

length.title: Length
length.description: Tracks the total number of days for a reservation.

modification.title: Modification
modification.description: Captured when a reservation has been modified.

modificationDate.title: Modification Date
modificationDate.description: Tracks when a reservation has been modified.

nonRefundableAmount.title: Non-Refundable Amount
nonRefundableAmount.description: Amount of the reservation price that is marked as non-refundable.

numberOfAdults.title: Number of Adults
numberOfAdults.description: Captures the number of adults associated with the reservation.

numberOfChildren.title: Number of Children
numberOfChildren.description: Captures the number of children associated with the reservation.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: Tracks the purpose of the reservation, typically either business or personal.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: The start pick-up/outbound/check-in date of the reservation.

triptype.title: Trip Type
triptype.description: Indicates if the reservation is for a one way, round trip, or multi-city.

flightReservations.description: Captures all details specific to an individual flight reservation

insuranceClaim.description: Captures fields related to a claim when initated by a customer.

adjustorID.title: Adjustor ID
adjustorID.description: Unique identifier for adjustor assigned to the claim.

policeReport.title: Police Report
policeReport.description: Flags whether or not a police report is available for the claim.

incidentLocation.title: Incident Location
incidentLocation.description: Location where the claim incident occurred.

deliveryEligible.title: Delivery Eligible
deliveryEligible.description: Indicates if the prescription available to be delivered.

ID.title: ID
ID.description: ID for the prescription being filled.

refill.title: Refill
refill.description: Indicates if the prescription is new or being refilled.

refillsRemaining.title: Refills Remaining
refillsRemaining.description: Count of the remaining prescription refills available.

upload.title: Upload
upload.description: Extension of the File Transfer data type.

couponCode.title: Coupon Code
couponCode.description: Coupon/promo code string used in a reservation search.

groupCode.title: Group Code
groupCode.description: Group code string used in a reservation search.

isFlexible.title: Reservation Search Is Flexibile
isFlexible.description: Tracks if a visitor selects a flexible date option for their reservation search.

productCode.title: Corporate Code
productCode.description: Corporate code string used in a reservation search.

rateType.title: Rate Type
rateType.description: Type of rate included in a reservation search.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: The start pick-up/outbound/check-in date of the reservation search.

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: The end drop-off/return/check-out date of the reservation search.

upgrades.description: Upgrade information including impressions and transactions associated with upgrades.

upgradeImpressions.title: Upgrade Impressions
upgradeImpressions.description: Array of the impressions data type.

upsells.description: Upsell information including impressions and transactions associated with upsells.

upsellImpressions.title: Upsell Impressions
upsellImpressions.description: Array of the impressions data type.

warrantyClaim.description: Captures fields related to a claim when initated by a customer.

length.title: Length
length.description: Records the length of the warranty, in months.
